title: How to Compliment a Girl over Text

steps.title: Give her recognition if she handled something really well.
steps.content: Give her recognition if she handled something really well. People love feeling appreciated for something they worked really hard to achieve, so show her that you’ve noticed. [1] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Just make sure you don’t make it sound like you’re surprised by her achievement since your compliment could come off as insincere. Try saying something like: [2] X Research source “You killed it in science class today! You're such a great lab partner.” “That was such an incredible presentation. I’m glad I was there to see it!” “You made really good points in today’s meeting.”

steps.title: Show her you love having conversations with her using this message.
steps.content: Show her you love having conversations with her using this message. It’s so nice when you can tell another person anything that’s on your mind, so tell the girl when you feel that way. She’ll appreciate knowing that she’s someone that you can trust and feel comfortable with. Try something like: [3] X Research source “You make it so easy to open up and talk.” “I appreciate how you’re always there when I need to chat.” “I feel so comfortable around you. I’d trust you with all of my secrets.”

steps.title: Tell her when she makes you laugh so she feels confident in her jokes.
steps.content: Tell her when she makes you laugh so she feels confident in her jokes. [4] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. It’s always a relief to know when one of your jokes lands, so mention how funny she is in your text. Respond with “haha,” “lol,” or a laughing emoji whenever she tells a joke and let her know how much you loved it. You could send messages like: [5] X Research source “I can’t stop thinking of that joke you told today. It was so funny!” “You always know how to make me laugh without even trying.” “You’re the most hilarious person I’ve ever met.”

steps.title: Mentioning this shows her you appreciate your conversations.
steps.content: Mentioning this shows her you appreciate your conversations. After you have a good conversation, let her know that you’re taking her words to heart. The girl will love that you value her opinions and care about what she says. let her know that you You could instead say something like: [6] X Research source “You have such a way with words.” “You’re so good at giving advice.”

steps.title: Complimenting her best feature keeps you from sounding generic.
steps.content: Complimenting her best feature keeps you from sounding generic. While you may think saying “You have a nice smile,” is enough, she’s probably heard it a million times. Instead, tell her something a little more creative about how her smile made you feel. [7] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. Choosing a specific trait or feeling to comment on helps show that you pay attention to her. [8] X Research source As another example, you may instead say, “Your smile could cheer up the grumpiest person on the planet.”

steps.title: A general comment on her appearance is flattering and won’t sound creepy.
steps.content: A general comment on her appearance is flattering and won’t sound creepy. This works well if you saw the girl earlier that day or if they sent you a picture, but you can say it any time. Avoid going into too much detail about what you like about her appearance, or she may feel like you’re objectifying her. Instead, stick with something like: [9] X Research source “That outfit looks amazing on you.” “You’re really beautiful.” “That’s a great look on you!” Reader Poll: We asked 405 wikiHow readers who have a girlfriend and 51% of them agreed that the best way to compliment her is by pointing out something specific about her outfit . [Take Poll] So try making a sweet, specific comment about what she’s wearing!

steps.title: Tell her you enjoy her company to let her know she’s fun to be with.
steps.content: Tell her you enjoy her company to let her know she’s fun to be with. People love to know if they’re fun to be around, so it makes a perfect compliment. After you’ve been together in person, drop a message in the chat about what you liked about the time you spent with them. You might say something like: [10] X Research source “There’s never a dull moment while you’re around, and I love that.” “You’re so easy to be around, I could just spend hours with you.” “You’re my favorite person, and I can’t wait to see you again.”

steps.title: She’ll love to know that you can’t get her out of your head.
steps.content: She’ll love to know that you can’t get her out of your head. Whenever the girl crosses your mind, shoot her a text about it. Let her know about what you’re doing that reminded you of her to make your message sound more genuine and less creepy. Even just knowing that she’s on your mind is enough to make her smile. Try saying something like: [11] X Research source “I’m still thinking about that story you told me in math class today.” “I was watching Jeopardy earlier and it reminded me of you. You’re so smart, you should be on this show!” “It’s been a tough day and you came to my mind. You’re always so good at cheering other people up.”

steps.title: Saying that you’ve learned from her shows you admire her smarts.
steps.content: Saying that you’ve learned from her shows you admire her smarts. Tailor your compliment to include some specific things that you’ve learned from her so you sound more genuine. [12] X Expert Source Imad Jbara Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. You could try something like: [13] X Research source “You have such good music taste. I always love when you share new songs with me.” “Thanks for showing me that recipe! You make it so easy to understand.” “I learned so much from your presentation earlier today! I can tell you put a lot of effort into it.”

steps.title: Bring up the qualities you love about her for a more meaningful compliment.
steps.content: Bring up the qualities you love about her for a more meaningful compliment. If the girl has left an impact on you, it’ll mean the world to her knowing how she affected you. Mentioning the things that you appreciate the most shows that you notice and care for her on a deeper level as well. Send her a text that says something like: [14] X Research source “You’re the most patient person I’ve met and it makes me want to get better too.” “I’ve always admired your confidence. I hope I can be as confident as you someday.” “I’ve been so lucky getting to know someone as positive as you. You make every day better.”
